draftboxPage.title: About Me
draftboxPage.metaDescription:
PITMASTER, YOUTUBER, DOG DAD, NATURE LOVER
5 years ago, I discovered my love for Barbecue. Living in Central Texas my whole life, I've been exposed to and grew up eating
some really good barbecue.

Outside of eating and cooking amazing barbecue, I am devoted to working out in the gym, spend most of my time with my dog Harley,
starting a YouTube channel, and am an avid lover of all things related to Nature.

> WHAT I BELIEVE

In order to make some GREAT barbecue, you do NOT need fancy equipment or techniques. All you need is a smoker, a thermometer, some
seasoning, and fuel (wood, charcoal, etc.) THAT'S IT!

Many people will go into great detail on injections, sophisticated wrapping methods, consistent temps, the list goes on. You can
achieve great results by KEEPING IT SIMPLE.’

In order to make some GREAT barbecue, you do NOT need fancy equipment or techniques. All you need is a smoker, a thermometer, some
seasoning, and fuel (wood, charcoal, etc.) THAT'S IT!

Many people will go into great detail on injections, sophisticated wrapping methods, consistent temps, the list goes on. You can
achieve great results by KEEPING IT SIMPLE.
